items.content_html: Lightweight, framework-agnostic library for OAuth 2.0 authentication with Okta using the PKCE flow. Seamlessly integrates with React, Angular, or any Node.js/TypeScript project. Provides easy-to-use methods for initiating authentication, handling callbacks, and refreshing tokens, with full TypeScript support.
items.title: TecnicoR/okta-pkce-auth-js: Lightweight, framework-agnostic library for OAuth 2.0 authentication with Okta using the PKCE flow. Seamlessly integrates with React, Angular, or any Node.js/TypeScript project. Provides easy-to-use methods for initiating authentication, handling callbacks, and refreshing tokens, with full TypeScript support.
